hero.title: AltesHaus
hero.subtitle: Authentic German Cuisine
hero.description: Experience the perfect blend of German hospitality and Macedonian flavors in an atmosphere of timeless elegance.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Where German tradition meets Macedonian heritage
story.culinaryBridgeText: In the heart of Mönchengladbach, AltesHaus represents a unique culinary journey that bridges two rich gastronomic traditions. Our restaurant celebrates the hearty, authentic flavors of German cuisine while honoring the vibrant, aromatic specialties of Macedonia.
story.passionArtistryText: Every dish tells a story of tradition, passion, and the artistry of combining time-honored recipes with fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. We believe that great food brings people together, creating moments of joy and connection that transcend cultural boundaries.
story.quote: Cooking is not just about feeding the body, but nourishing the soul and creating connections that transcend borders.

featuredDishes.title: Featured Dishes
featuredDishes.subtitle: Discover our signature creations that perfectly blend German traditions with Macedonian influences, crafted with passion and served with pride
featuredDishes.schnitzelAjvarDesc: Traditional German schnitzel elevated with our house-made Macedonian ajvar sauce and seasonal vegetables, creating a perfect harmony of flavors.
featuredDishes.macedonianKebapiDesc: Hand-rolled spiced meat cylinders grilled to perfection, served with fresh onions and traditional bread, bringing authentic Balkan flavors to your table.
featuredDishes.balkanSauerbratenDesc: Classic German pot roast with a Balkan twist, marinated in wine and Macedonian spices, slow-cooked to tender perfection with rich, complex flavors.
featuredDishes.fullMenuSubtitle: Discover more culinary masterpieces that celebrate the perfect fusion of German tradition and Macedonian heritage

contact.title: Visit Us
contact.subtitle: Located in the heart of Mönchengladbach, we're ready to welcome you for an unforgettable dining experience
contact.loveToHear: We'd love to hear from you

about.title: About AltesHaus
about.subtitle: Discover the story behind our passion for authentic German cuisine and traditional Macedonian specialties
about.heritageSubtitle: A legacy of culinary excellence spanning two cultures
about.founded2009Text: AltesHaus was born from a vision to create a unique dining experience that celebrates the rich culinary traditions of both Germany and Macedonia. Our founder, Chef Marcus Weber, spent years perfecting the art of fusion cuisine.
about.culturalBridgeText: We believe food is a universal language that brings people together. Our menu reflects this philosophy, offering dishes that honor traditional recipes while embracing innovative techniques.
about.localCommitmentText: We source our ingredients from local farmers and suppliers whenever possible, supporting our community while ensuring the freshest flavors in every dish we serve.
about.philosophySubtitle: The principles that guide our culinary journey
about.freshLocalText: We source the finest local ingredients, supporting our community while ensuring exceptional quality in every dish we serve.
about.culturalBridgePhilosophyText: We believe food transcends borders, bringing together German precision and Macedonian warmth in perfect harmony.
about.passionHeartText: Every dish is crafted with love and dedication, creating memorable experiences that nourish both body and soul.
about.experienceStorySubtitle: Join us for an unforgettable dining experience where German tradition meets Macedonian heritage
about.visitUsTodaySubtitle: Located in the heart of Mönchengladbach's historic district

menu.readyToExperienceSubtitle: Reserve your table today and embark on a culinary journey that bridges cultures and creates unforgettable memories

footer.tagline: Where German tradition meets Macedonian heritage
footer.aboutUsText: Authentic German cuisine with traditional Macedonian specialties, crafted with passion and served with pride in the heart of Mönchengladbach.
